display_help: As Diabolique's ritual has progressed, Dominatrix has become more and more intimately connected to Mot and Diabolique. As Diabolique's health is lost, Dominatrix will suffer faster health loss. However, this can be offset by destroying the creatures found within Mot or by freeing the heroes trapped inside, which returns life energy to Mot and also regenerating Dominatrix.
